channel.title: Ratatouille Video Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Ratatouille: In theaters June 29
channel.itunes:author: Disney-Pixar
channel.itunes:summary: Academy Award-winning director Brad Bird ("The Incredibles") and the amazing storytellers at Pixar Animation Studios ("Cars," "Finding Nemo") take you into an entirely new and original world where the unthinkable combination of a rat and a 5-star gourmet restaurant come together for the ultimate fish-out-of-water tale. In the hilarious new animated-adventure, RATATOUILLE, a rat named Remy dreams of becoming a great chef despite his familie's wishes and the obvious problem of being a rat in a decidedly rodent-phobic profession. Remy learns the truth about friendship, family and having no choice but to be who he really is, a rat who wants to be a chef.

item.title: Ratatouille Official Movie Trailer
item.itunes:author: Disney-Pixar
item.itunes:subtitle: The official movie trailer for Walt Disney Pictures' and Pixar's new animated feature, Ratatouille.
item.itunes:summary: Academy Award-winning director Brad Bird ("The Incredibles") and the amazing storytellers at Pixar Animation Studios ("Cars," "Finding Nemo") take you into an entirely new and original world where the unthinkable combination of a rat and a 5-star gourmet restaurant come together for the ultimate fish-out-of-water tale. In the hilarious new animated-adventure, RATATOUILLE, a rat named Remy dreams of becoming a great chef despite his familie's wishes and the obvious problem of being a rat in a decidedly rodent-phobic profession. Remy learns the truth about friendship, family and having no choice but to be who he really is, a rat who wants to be a chef.

item.title: Emile's Magic Trick
item.itunes:author: Disney-Pixar
item.itunes:subtitle: In a rare piece of rough Pixar animation, watch Emile (Ratatouille's brother) and his remarkable ability to make food disappear.
item.itunes:summary: In a rare piece of rough Pixar animation, watch Emile (Ratatouille's brother) and his remarkable ability to make food disappear.

item.title: Brad Bird: A Disney-Pixar History
item.itunes:author: Disney-Pixar
item.itunes:subtitle: Patton Oswalt (voice of Remy) and Producer Brad Lewis explore Academy-Award winning director Brad Bird's painted history.
item.itunes:summary: Patton Oswalt (voice of Remy) and Producer Brad Lewis explore Academy-Award winning director Brad Bird's painted history as they introduce you to the story of RATATOUILLE and Remy's character.

item.title: Cooking 101
item.itunes:author: Disney-Pixar
item.itunes:subtitle: Join the animators in the real life kitchen that inspired the design and authenticity of Gusteau's Restaurant.
item.itunes:summary: Join the animators in the real life kitchen that inspired the design and authenticity of Gusteau's Restaurant. Michael Warch, set/layout manager and production sous chef on Ratatouille, talks about working behind the scenes in fine restaurants around the world and how these experiences helped shape the world in Ratatouille.
item.itunes:keywords: Entertainment, Movies and Television, Food, Comedy, Family, Disney, Animation, Animated, Cartoons, Cars, CGI, John Lasseter, Pixar, Finding Nemo, Monsters Inc, Toy Story, A Bugs Life, Brad Bird, Brad Lewis, Patton Oswalt, Brian Dennehy, Brad Garrett, Janeane Garofalo, Ian Holm, Peter O'Toole, Cooking, Culinary, Paris, Kitchen, France, French, Restaurant, Chef, Friendship, Family, Chef, Jan Pinkava

item.title: The Technical Ingredients of Ratatouille
item.itunes:author: Disney-Pixar
item.itunes:subtitle: Michael Fong, Supervising Technical Director on Ratatouille, discusses some of the new technical challenges faced by the animators.
item.itunes:summary: Making water look real, clothing look wet, and fur look soft and fuzzy are just some of the technical challenges faced by the Pixar animation team. Go behind the scenes with Michael Fong, Supervising Technical Director on Ratatouille, to learn how they addressed these complex problems.
item.itunes:keywords: Entertainment, Movies and Television, Food, Comedy, Family, Disney, Animation, Animated, Cartoons, Cars, CGI, John Lasseter, Pixar, Finding Nemo, Monsters Inc, Toy Story, A Bugs Life, Brad Bird, Brad Lewis, Patton Oswalt, Brian Dennehy, Brad Garrett, Janeane Garofalo, Ian Holm, Peter O'Toole, Cooking, Culinary, Paris, Kitchen, France, French, Restaurant, Chef, Friendship, Family, Chef, Jan Pinkava

item.title: Patton on Remy
item.itunes:author: Disney-Pixar
item.itunes:subtitle: Stand-up comedian Patton Oswalt (voice of Remy) talks about his character and how Brad Bird has allowed him to become part of animation history.
item.itunes:summary: Stand-up comedian Patton Oswalt (voice of Remy) talks about his character, how Brad Bird has allowed him to become part of animation history and how the self-proclaimed 'foodie' has embodied Remy.

item.itunes:subtitle: The animators at Pixar take physical comedy to a whole new level with Linguini - Remy's unlikely partner in culinary crime!
item.itunes:summary: The animators at Pixar take physical comedy to a whole new level with Linguini (voiced by Lou Romano) - Remy's unlikely partner in culinary crime!

item.title: Getting Into Character
item.itunes:author: Disney-Pixar
item.itunes:subtitle: The Pixar animators boil down the essences of the characters and dish about how they infused those principles into their animation.
item.itunes:summary: The Pixar animators boil down the essences of the characters and dish about how they infused those principles into their animation. Authenticity, sincerity and humor were top of mind while bringing the cast of Ratatouille to life.

item.title: The Comedians of Ratatouille
item.itunes:author: Disney-Pixar
item.itunes:subtitle: Whet your appetite for laughter with the comedic talent behind Disney-Pixar's new movie, RATATOUILLE.
item.itunes:summary: Whet your appetite for laughter with the comedic talent behind Disney-Pixar's new movie, RATATOUILLE. Brad Bird, Director of RATATOUILLE, takes us into the recording sessions with Patton Oswalt (voice of Remy), Brad Garrett (voice of Gusteau), and Janeane Garofalo (voice of Colette).

item.itunes:subtitle: Disney-Pixar found the perfect ingredients for this summer's freshest comedy, RATATOUILLE.
item.itunes:summary: Disney-Pixar found the perfect ingredients in Peter Sohn (Pixar Animator/voice of Emile) and Lou Romano (Pixar Production Designer/voice of Linguini) for this summer's freshest comedy, RATATOUILLE.
